description: Updates the pricing tier for an Amazon Q Business subscription. Upgrades are instant. Downgrades apply at the start of the next month. Subscription tier determines feature access for the user. For more information on subscriptions and pricing tiers, see Amazon Q Business pricing.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application where the subscription update should take effect.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business subscription to be updated.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the Amazon Q Business subscription to be updated.

nested_items.name: subscriptionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Q Business subscription that was updated.

nested_items.name: currentSubscription
nested_items.description: The type of your current Amazon Q Business subscription.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of an Amazon Q Business subscription.

nested_items.name: nextSubscription
nested_items.description: The type of the Amazon Q Business subscription for the next month.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of an Amazon Q Business subscription.
